projects: [{"title":"FamFlet - Bake.Buy.Sell","start_date":"Nov 2020","end_date":"Jan 2021","description":"FamFlet is an Ad-posting App specially fabricated for college students to sell and buy goods and services such as notes, books, hardware, etc. to and from other students nearby them. FamFlet aims at providing a one-stop, easy-to-use interface for students to sell what they don't use anymore and buy what they need at prices of their own choice. With the app's 'Make An Offer' feature, students can name the price they want to pay to buy a product being sold by a fellow student.FamFlet's objective is to help college students meet their requirements at cheaper prices without having to scout for fellow students selling what they need."}]
